T02TD3045E:87a-0: @87a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3045E:87a-1: bsod nams rgya chen po 'phel bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02TD3045E:87a-2: gnas khang yid dang mthun par 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i lha sum cu rtsa lnga'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs la /
T02TD3045E:87a-3: bum pa yang lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa la /
T02TD3045E:87b-0: so so'i mtshan mas btab la dar sna tshogs pa'i @87b mgul chings kyis gdags so //
T02TD3045E:87b-1: dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhir kun du shug pa dang smyug ma dang /
T02TD3045E:87b-2: 'dam bu dang seng ldeng gi shing gi lo ma dang 'bras bur bcas pa rim par 'khor bar gzugs so //
T02TD3045E:87b-3: steng nas dar dmar po'i yol bas dgab /
T02TD3045E:87b-4: gnas khang gi logs rnams su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ris su bris pa dang /
T02TD3045E:87b-6: lugs su blugs pa la sogs pa'i rten rnams dgram /
T02TD3045E:87b-7: pusti dang glegs bam la sogs pa yang dgram /
T02TD3045E:87b-8: de nas mchod pa'i bye brag spos kyi reng bu stong /
T02TD3045E:87b-13: gtor ma de snyed cig tu bsham mo //
T02TD3045E:87b-14: shar du gdugs rgya shog las byas pa dkar po stong /
T02TD3045E:87b-15: lhor ba dan ser po stong /
T02TD3045E:87b-17: byang du 'phen kha dog sna tshogs stong bshams la gnas khang gi mtha' ma thams cad du rtsva ku sha dang d'ur bas khyab par dgram mo //
T02TD3045E:87b-18: sngags pa dam tshig dang ldan pa dgu'am bcu gcig go //
T02TD3045E:87b-19: gcig gis shar phyogs su rgyud stong phrag gcig klag / gcig gis lho phyogs su chu gtor stong phrag gcig gtang /
T02TD3045E:87b-20: gcig gis nub tu chu sbyin stong phrag gcig gtang /
T02TD3045E:87b-21: gcig gis byang du mchod rten stong gdab /
T02TD3045E:87b-22: gcig gis shar lho nas mchod pa bya /
T02TD3045E:87b-23: gcig gis lho nub nas bstod /
T02TD3045E:87b-24: gcig gis nub byang nas gtor ma gtang /
T02TD3045E:87b-25: gcig gis byang shar du yi ge brgya pa stong phrag gcig bzlas /
T02TD3045E:87b-26: bdag nyid kyis snying po rgyas bsdus la ci rigs rgyun ma chad par bya'o //
T02TD3045E:87b-27: 'brug gi nyi ma la gtad la zhag gsum du de ltar bya ste /
T02TD3045E:87b-28: bza' ba dang btung ba'i bye brag sna tshogs pa la longs spyad /
T02TD3045E:87b-29: gnas khang gi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar 'bum lnga klag pa la sogs pa dge sbyor grub tshad du bya'o //
T02TD3045E:87b-30: bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci byas pa rnams bshags so //
T02TD3045E:87b-31: de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab bo //
T02TD3045E:87b-32: grub na gzhan la ston mo rgya che ba bya /
T02TD3045E:87b-33: de nas 'brug gi nyi ma la gtor ma la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams 'bab chu chen po la bskyal lo //
T02TD3045E:88a-0: grong khyer gyi shar phyogs su dung @88a * //
T02TD3045E:88a-1: sna tshogs pa'i sgra chen bsgrag cing gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng /
T02TD3045E:88a-2: lho ru rnga sna tshogs pa'i sgra bsgrag cing ba dan bsgreng /
T02TD3045E:88a-6: rta dang glang po la zhen /
T02TD3045E:88a-7: byang du dril bu dang pheg rdob kyi sgra sgrog cing dar sna tshogs pa phyar ro //
T02TD3045E:88a-8: de nas tshogs ci rigs par bsag cing bshags pa rnams bya'o //
T02TD3045E:88a-9: de lta bu'i chog lan gsum mam bdun byas na /
T02TD3045E:88a-10: rnal 'byor pa de'i bsod nams phyogs thams cad du shing skam po la me 'bar ba bzhin du 'gro bar nges so //
T02TD3045E:88a-11: bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa'i dpal ye shes kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD3045E:88a-12: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs pa'o /
